text: I'd like to take a minute to gush over
one of my very favorite people a
multi-hyphenate by definition actor
writer director and producer this very
special buddy of mine is talent
personified and has always embodied
openness and sincerity not so hard on
the eyes either
ladies and gentlemen Greta Gerwig Greta
congratulations on your very
well-deserved WGA and DGA nominations
and thank you for lending your voice and
sharing your stories because we are all
better because of it thank you so much
and thank you to sag thank you
absolutely we're happy to have you I'd
also like to take a second to thank the
Directors Guild of America the Writers
Guild of America and the American
Federation of musicians plus I Otzi in
the Teamsters for helping make tonight's
celebration possible we also want to
give a special thanks to TNT People
magazine and the entertainment industry
foundation for their continued
partnership and generous support of the
sag AFTRA Foundation and now it is my
pleasure to introduce one of our
strongest advocates the president of
sag-aftra
Gabrielle Carteris
